Package org.apache.hama.bsp.message

Contains the implementation of message transfer.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HamaMessageManager<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Hama RPC Interface for messaging.
    MessageEventListener<M>  
    MessageManager<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    This manager takes care of the messaging.
    OutgoingMessageManager<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

    Class Description
    AbstractMessageManager<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Abstract baseclass that should contain all information and services needed for the concrete RPC subclasses.

    HamaAsyncMessageManagerImpl<M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Implementation of the HamaMessageManager

    Implementation of the HamaMessageManager.
